subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark Teixeira, the Yankees’ first baseman who has been hampered by a confounding cough for more than a month, hit the decisive home run in the team’s victory over the Orioles.
snippet: Mark Teixeira, the Yankees’ first baseman who has been hampered by a confounding cough for more than a month, hit the decisive home run in the team’s victory over the Orioles.
